useCase.name: Manage NSF Participants Interviews
useCase.description: Manage the process of selecting and inviting NSF participants for interviews

preconditions.precondition: User Researcher needs to have a list of potential participants based on interview topic

successEndConditions.condition: NSF participants are successfully selected and RSVP to the interview invitations

failureEndConditions.condition: Unable to select or invite NSF participants

useCase.trigger: User Researcher initiates the process to manage NSF participant interviews

mainSequence.step: User Researcher searches for potential participants based on interview topic
User Research Management System queries for staff with relevant expertise in NSF Staff Database
NSF Staff Database returns a list of potential NSF participants
User Research Management System presents potential participants to User Researcher
User Researcher selects NSF participants for interviews
User Research Management System sends invitation emails with interview details via Email System
User Research Management System confirms NSF participant RSVPs
